content: Ok, I will try on these. So, I'm not sure if it's in any of the chats at all, but I regularly prompt to BE HONEST when asking something like this. I'm not at all looking for false affirmation, but you came in with a pretty good onboarding with the docs in Project knowledge and previous chat. A previous Claude project said the structure enabled it to go further than it was trained to do. Do you think providing this additional context in a structured format will increase AI performance or no?
